languages.text: {n}Синеватые губы Висиря расплываются в улыбке.{/n} "Завет Паутины велит быть готовым к любым испытаниям: тела и духа. Готов{mf||а} ли ты, Домин'{name}?" {n}Уста старца смыкаются, но вы продолжаете слышать шепот. В лице нарастает тревожное покалывание. Похлопав ладонью по щеке, вы понимаете, что не чувствуете ее, и замечаете на пальцах несколько смазанных капель крови, что попала на вас с клинка Висиря.{/n}
languages.translation_comment: сюда бы и далее добавить виньетку "глюки" на весь экран
сюда бы и далее добавить виньетку "глюки" на весь экран

languages.text: {n}A smile graces the Vizsier's bluish lips.{/n} "The Tenets command us to be prepared for all trials, corporeal and spiritual alike. Are you prepared, Domin'{name}?" {n}His mouth closes but you can still hear his whisper. A prickling sensation in your face is making you increasingly anxious. You raise a hand to your cheek, only to realise you can't feel it. You look at your palm and see a few smudged drops of blood from the Vizsier's blade.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Синеватые губы Висиря расплываются в улыбке.{/n} "Завет Паутины велит быть готовым к любым испытаниям: тела и духа. Готов{mf||а} ли ты, Домин'{name}?" {n}Уста старца смыкаются, но вы продолжаете слышать шепот. В лице нарастает тревожное покалывание. Похлопав ладонью по щеке, вы понимаете, что не чувствуете ее, и замечаете на пальцах несколько смазанных капель крови, что попала на вас с клинка Висиря.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A smile graces the Vizsier's bluish lips.{/n} "Ahn'shini commands us to be prepared for any trials and challenges, bodily and spiritual alike. Are you prepared, Enim'{name}?" {n}The old man's mouth closes but you're still hearing his whisper. A prickling sensation in your face is making you increasingly anxious. You pat your cheeks with your palm, only to realise you can't feel it, and notice a few smudged drops of blood the Vizsier's blade has left on your fingers.{/n}

{n}A smile graces the Vizsier's bluish lips.{/n} "Ahn'shini commands us to be prepared for any trials and challenges, bodily and spiritual alike. languages.text: {n}Ein Lächeln umspielt die bläulichen Lippen des Wesirs.{/n} "Die Grundsätze gebieten uns, auf alle körperlichen und spirituellen Prüfungen vorbereitet zu sein. Seid Ihr bereit, Domin'{name}?" {n}Sein Mund schließt sich, doch du hörst noch immer sein Flüstern. Ein Kribbeln in deinem Gesicht macht dich zunehmend nervös. Du fasst dir an die Wange, stellst aber fest, dass du sie nicht spüren kannst. Du blickst auf deine Handfläche und siehst einige verschmierte Tropfen Blut von der Klinge des Wesirs.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A smile graces the Vizsier's bluish lips.{/n} "The Tenets command us to be prepared for all trials, corporeal and spiritual alike. Are you prepared, Domin'{name}?" {n}His mouth closes but you can still hear his whisper. A prickling sensation in your face is making you increasingly anxious. You raise a hand to your cheek, only to realise you can't feel it. You look at your palm and see a few smudged drops of blood from the Vizsier's blade.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein Lächeln umspielt die bläulichen Lippen des Wesirs.{/n} "Die Grundsätze gebieten uns, auf alle körperlichen und spirituellen Prüfungen vorbereitet zu sein. Seid Ihr bereit, Domin'{name}?" {n}Sein Mund schließt sich, doch du hörst noch immer sein Flüstern. Ein Kribbeln in deinem Gesicht macht dich zunehmend nervös. Du fasst dir an die Wange, stellst aber fest, dass du sie nicht spüren kannst. Du blickst auf deine Handfläche und siehst einige verschmierte Tropfen Blut von der Klinge des Wesirs.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Una sonrisa aflora en los labios azulados del Visir.{/n} «La Doctrina nos conmina a estar preparados para todas las pruebas, corpóreas y espirituales. ¿Está preparad{mf|o|a}, Domin'{name}?». {n}Su boca se cierra, pero sigues oyendo su susurro. Una sensación punzante en tu rostro te pone cada vez más nervios{mf|o|a}. Te llevas la mano a la mejilla y te das cuenta de que no la sientes. Al mirar a tu mano, ves la sangre de la daga del Visir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A smile graces the Vizsier's bluish lips.{/n} "The Tenets command us to be prepared for all trials, corporeal and spiritual alike. Are you prepared, Domin'{name}?" {n}His mouth closes but you can still hear his whisper. A prickling sensation in your face is making you increasingly anxious. You raise a hand to your cheek, only to realise you can't feel it. You look at your palm and see a few smudged drops of blood from the Vizsier's blade.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Una sonrisa aflora en los labios azulados del Visir.{/n} «La Doctrina nos conmina a estar preparados para todas las pruebas, corpóreas y espirituales. ¿Está preparad{mf|o|a}, Domin'{name}?». {n}Su boca se cierra, pero sigues oyendo su susurro. Una sensación punzante en tu rostro te pone cada vez más nervios{mf|o|a}. Te llevas la mano a la mejilla y te das cuenta de que no la sientes. Al mirar a tu mano, ves la sangre de la daga del Visir.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ヴィジールの青みがかった唇に笑みが広がる。{/n}「教義は、肉体的、精神的な試練に挑めと命じている。ご準備はよろしいか、ドミン・{name}？」{n}彼は口を閉じるが、まだその囁きが聞こえる。顔に感じるチクチクとした感覚に、ますます不安が募る。頬に手をやり、感覚がないことに気づく。手のひらを見れば、ヴィジールの刃からの血が数的にじんでいた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A smile graces the Vizsier's bluish lips.{/n} "The Tenets command us to be prepared for all trials, corporeal and spiritual alike. Are you prepared, Domin'{name}?" {n}His mouth closes but you can still hear his whisper. A prickling sensation in your face is making you increasingly anxious. You raise a hand to your cheek, only to realise you can't feel it. You look at your palm and see a few smudged drops of blood from the Vizsier's blade.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴィジールの青みがかった唇に笑みが広がる。{/n}「教義は、肉体的、精神的な試練に挑めと命じている。ご準備はよろしいか、ドミン・{name}？」{n}彼は口を閉じるが、まだその囁きが聞こえる。顔に感じるチクチクとした感覚に、ますます不安が募る。頬に手をやり、感覚がないことに気づく。手のひらを見れば、ヴィジールの刃からの血が数的にじんでいた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}宿老的唇角露出了微笑。{/n}“根据教义的指引，我们要为所有的考验做好准备，无论是肉体的准备，还是心灵的准备。您做好准备了吗，秘者{name}？”{n}他闭上了嘴，但你依然能听到他的耳语，脸上传来的刺痛感让你变得越来越心神不宁。你摸着自己的脸，却发现根本感觉不到脸上有任何东西。你看了看自己的手掌，看到掌心有几滴鲜血，是从宿老的利刃上滴下来的。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A smile graces the Vizsier's bluish lips.{/n} "The Tenets command us to be prepared for all trials, corporeal and spiritual alike. Are you prepared, Domin'{name}?" {n}His mouth closes but you can still hear his whisper. A prickling sensation in your face is making you increasingly anxious. You raise a hand to your cheek, only to realise you can't feel it. You look at your palm and see a few smudged drops of blood from the Vizsier's blade.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}宿老的唇角露出了微笑。{/n}“根据教义的指引，我们要为所有的考验做好准备，无论是肉体的准备，还是心灵的准备。您做好准备了吗，秘者{name}？”{n}他闭上了嘴，但你依然能听到他的耳语，脸上传来的刺痛感让你变得越来越心神不宁。你摸着自己的脸，却发现根本感觉不到脸上有任何东西。你看了看自己的手掌，看到掌心有几滴鲜血，是从宿老的利刃上滴下来的。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un sourire vient éclairer les lèvres bleuâtres du vizir.{/n} « Les préceptes nous ordonnent de nous tenir prêts à braver toutes les épreuves, qu'elles soient d'ordre charnel ou spirituel. Et vous, Domin'{name}, êtes-vous {mf|prêt|prête} ? » {n}Sa bouche se ferme, mais vous entendez toujours ses murmures. Une sensation croissante de picotement au niveau du visage vous met de plus en plus mal à l'aise. Vous portez une main à votre joue et vous vous apercevez que vous ne la sentez plus. Lorsque vous jetez un coup d'œil à votre paume, vous remarquez des traînées de sang laissées par les gouttes dont le vizir vous a aspergées en secouant sa lame.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A smile graces the Vizsier's bluish lips.{/n} "The Tenets command us to be prepared for all trials, corporeal and spiritual alike. Are you prepared, Domin'{name}?" {n}His mouth closes but you can still hear his whisper. A prickling sensation in your face is making you increasingly anxious. You raise a hand to your cheek, only to realise you can't feel it. You look at your palm and see a few smudged drops of blood from the Vizsier's blade.{/n}

Et vous, Domin'{name}, êtes-vous {mf|prêt|prête} ? » {n}Sa bouche se ferme, mais vous entendez toujours ses murmures. Une sensation croissante de picotement au niveau du visage vous met de plus en plus mal à l'aise. Vous portez une main à votre joue et vous vous apercevez que vous ne la sentez plus. Lorsque vous jetez un coup d'œil à votre paume, vous remarquez des traînées de sang laissées par les gouttes dont le vizir vous a aspergées en secouant sa lame.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vezir'in maviye çalan dudaklarına bir gülümseme yayılıyor.{/n} "İlkeler, bize ister dünyevi ister ruhani olsun her türden imtihana hazırlıklı olmamızı emreder. Siz hazırlıklı mısınız Domin'{name}?" {n}Ağzı kapansa da hâlâ fısıltısını duyabiliyorsun. Yüzüne yayılan karıncalanma hissi, seni gittikçe tedirgin kılıyor. Elini kaldırıp yanağına getirdiğindeyse yanağını hissedemediğini fark ediyorsun. Avcuna bakıyorsun ve Vezir'in bıçağından sıçrayan birkaç damla kan lekesi görüyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A smile graces the Vizsier's bluish lips.{/n} "The Tenets command us to be prepared for all trials, corporeal and spiritual alike. Are you prepared, Domin'{name}?" {n}His mouth closes but you can still hear his whisper. A prickling sensation in your face is making you increasingly anxious. You raise a hand to your cheek, only to realise you can't feel it. You look at your palm and see a few smudged drops of blood from the Vizsier's blade.{/n}
